title: Respond to Agression with ?
body: I should of taken a photo of it but I was playing a game and an alert kept coming up in yellow writing respond to agression with staide7 or something like that everyone could see it and it would just do 10 rows of it then stop and continue anyone know what it is. Im really intrigued by it now.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This issue has been reported and escalated to the appropriate team(s) to be dealt with.

We do not currently have an ETA on a fix.

Edit: A fix is on the way!
